name: QR Code Generator - Free Custom QR Codes
description: Create custom QR codes with logo overlay, UTM tracking, and download in PNG/SVG formats. Works offline!

shortcuts.name: Generate QR Code
shortcuts.description: Quickly generate a new QR code
